viewer.title: Case Viewer
viewer.noSequenceImages: No sequence images available for this view
viewer.noBeforeAfterImage: No before/after image available for this view

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
points: There may be differences between the computer-generated prediction and the actual clinical outcome
The number of aligners may increase depending on the case requirements
The treating doctor is solely responsible for the treatment plan

statusMessages.awaitingApproval: Please review the treatment plan details and choose to approve, decline, or request edits.
statusMessages.approved: Your plan is approved. Production will start soon.
statusMessages.inProduction: Your aligners are currently being manufactured.
statusMessages.readyForDelivery: Your aligners are ready for delivery.
statusMessages.delivered: Your aligners have been delivered. Follow your treatment schedule.
statusMessages.userRejected: You have declined the treatment plan.

submitted.title: Review the case and accept it
submitted.description: Review the case information, then accept or decline the case.

accepted.title: Case accepted - Create treatment plan
accepted.description: Set aligners count and duration, then send to doctor for approval.

awaiting_user_approval.title: Treatment plan is sent to doctor for approval
awaiting_user_approval.description: Waiting for the doctor approval to proceed with the production process.

approved.title: Doctor approved the treatment plan
approved.description: Proceed with manufacturing. Update the case status as production progresses.

in_production.title: Aligners are in production
in_production.description: Update to Ready for Delivery when manufacturing is complete.

ready_for_delivery.title: Aligners are ready for delivery
ready_for_delivery.description: Mark as Delivered once the clinic receives their aligners.

delivered.title: Aligners delivered to clinic
delivered.description: Mark the case as Completed when treatment concludes.

completed.title: The case is complete
completed.description: The doctor had finished the case

rejected.title: Case has been declined
rejected.description: This case was declined and is no longer active. You can undo this action if needed.

user_rejected.title: Treatment plan was declined
user_rejected.description: This case's Treatment plan was declined by the doctor and the case is no longer active.

patientInfo.deliveryDateHelp: Select the latest acceptable delivery date
patientInfo.urgentNoticeDescription: Urgent cases may incur additional fees and are subject to availability. We'll contact you to confirm the delivery timeline and any extra charges.

fileUpload.compressedArchive: Compressed Archive (Upload all scans in one ZIP/RAR file)
fileUpload.individualDescription: Please upload each scan file separately. Ensure all scan files are in STL, OBJ, or PLY format.
fileUpload.compressedDescription: Upload a single ZIP or RAR file containing all three required scans: Upper Jaw, Lower Jaw, and Bite scans. Please name your files clearly (e.g., upper_jaw.stl, lower_jaw.stl, bite.stl) for easy identification.

diagnosis.title: Basic Diagnosis
diagnosis.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Enter any special instructions, patient history, or additional details...
diagnosis.additionalNotesHelp: Add any additional information or special instructions for this case

errors.authRequired: User must be authenticated to submit a case
errors.deliveryDateRequired: Delivery date is required for urgent cases
errors.deliveryDateFuture: Delivery date must be in the future
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum file size is 100MB.
errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Allowed types are: {{types}}

selectDoctor.label: Select Doctor
selectDoctor.helpText: Search and select the doctor for this case
selectDoctor.placeholder: Search by doctor name or email...

alerts.fileUploadOptional: Admin Note: File uploads are optional. You can submit the case without files and add them later.
alerts.success: Case submitted successfully for the selected doctor!

errors.doctorRequired: Please select a doctor for this case

submitted.title: Waiting for admin acceptance
submitted.description: Your case is submitted successfully, please wait for the admin acceptance

awaitingUserApproval.title: Treatment Plan Ready for Approval
awaitingUserApproval.description: Please review the aligners count and estimated duration, then approve or decline the plan.

approved.title: Treatment Plan Approved
approved.description: Your treatment plan has been approved. Production will start soon.

inProduction.title: Aligners Are In Production
inProduction.description: Your aligners are being manufactured. You will be notified when they are ready for delivery.

readyForDelivery.title: Aligners Ready for Delivery
readyForDelivery.description: Your aligners are ready. Out team will contact you to arrange pickup or delivery.

delivered.title: Aligners Delivered
delivered.description: You have received the aligners. Please advise your patient to follow the wear schedule and instructions.

completed.title: Treatment Completed
completed.description: The treatment is complete. Thank you for choosing us!

rejected.title: Case has been declined
rejected.description: This case was declined and is no longer active. You can undo this action if needed.

user_rejected.title: Treatment plan was declined
user_rejected.description: This case's Treatment plan was declined and the case is no longer active.

default.title: Case Updates
default.description: We will notify you here when there are updates to your treatment plan.

caseAcceptanceCard.title: Case Review
caseAcceptanceCard.description: Review the submitted case and decide whether to accept or decline it. If accepted, you can proceed to create the treatment plan.
caseAcceptanceCard.caseStudyFeeSet: Case study fee has been set. You can now proceed to create the treatment plan.
caseAcceptanceCard.caseAcceptedAlert: This case has been accepted. The case study fee has been set and the case is ready for treatment planning.

casePage.deleteCaseConfirm: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to permanently delete this case?

fileDownload.noFiles: No files uploaded for this case.

refinement.description: Mark your case as completed or request a refinement if you need additional aligners or treatment adjustments.

dialog.title: Request Refinement
dialog.description: Request a refinement of your treatment plan with new scans and updated preferences.
dialog.warningMessage: Your refinement request will be reviewed by our team. We will contact you with pricing and treatment details.
dialog.reasonHelp: Please describe why you need refinement (e.g., treatment not progressing as expected, new concerns, etc.)
dialog.compressedArchive: Compressed Archive (Upload all scans in one ZIP/RAR file)
dialog.individualHelp: Please upload each scan file separately. Ensure all scan files are in STL, OBJ, or PLY format.
dialog.compressedHelp: Upload a single ZIP or RAR file containing all three required scans: Upper Jaw, Lower Jaw, and Bite scans. Please name your files clearly for easy identification.

errors.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for the refinement request
errors.allScansRequired: Please upload all required scan files
errors.compressedRequired: Please upload the compressed scan archive
errors.compressedUploadFailed: Failed to upload compressed scan file
errors.scanUploadFailed: Failed to upload one or more scan files

dialog.title: Complete Your Case
dialog.description: Please share your experience with us. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
dialog.ratingLabel: How satisfied are you with the treatment?
dialog.commentsHelp: Tell us about your experience with the treatment.

errors.completeFailed: Failed to mark case as completed

approval.title: Confirm Treatment Plan Approval
approval.message: Are you sure you want to approve this treatment plan? Once approved, production will begin and the plan cannot be modified.
approval.productionMessage: Production of your aligners will begin shortly after approval.

decline.title: Decline Case
decline.message: Please provide the reason of declining the treatment plan.
decline.reasonPlaceholder: Enter the reason for declining this case...
decline.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for declining this case.
decline.infoText: This information will be recorded and may be shared with relevant team members.

requestEdit.title: Request Treatment Plan Edit
requestEdit.subtitle: Request changes to your treatment plan by selecting a different aligner material and adding notes.
requestEdit.materialDescription: Select a different aligner material. Your case will be re-evaluated by our team.
requestEdit.notesDescription: Add any specific requests or concerns about your treatment plan.
requestEdit.notesPlaceholder: Enter any additional notes or requests for our team...
requestEdit.notesHelp: These notes will be visible to the team member reviewing your case.
requestEdit.warningMessage: Changing the aligner material will send your case back to out team for re-evaluation. You will need to approve the updated treatment plan once it's ready.

toast.materialUpdatedReeval: Material updated. Case is sent for re-evaluation by our team.

messages.approved: Treatment plan approved. Ready to begin production.

iprChart.legend: Orange values indicate IPR (Interproximal Reduction) in millimeters

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.enterValues: Enter mesial (M) and distal (D) IPR values in millimeters for each tooth
instructions.leaveEmpty: Leave fields empty for surfaces with no IPR
instructions.combineValues: The viewer will combine adjacent values (e.g., mesial of #8 + mesial of #9)
instructions.clickSave: Click Save to store the IPR chart with the treatment plan

treatmentPlanImages.title: Treatment Plan Images
treatmentPlanImages.subtitle: Upload sequence images and before/after comparisons for this case.

sequence.title: Upload Sequence Images
sequence.description: Upload multiple images for each view showing the treatment progression. Images will be numbered automatically as Step 1, Step 2, etc.

beforeAfter.title: Upload Before & After
beforeAfter.description: Upload a single combined image showing both before and after for each view.
